name: Set of 4 Just My Type Notecards (blue)
description:
This playful card is the perfect combination of simple design and great copy!

Mimicking an old fashioned typewriter and the great types used in letterpress, the notecards are in royal blue printed on Crane Lettra paper (100% cotton, paper-free) with matching blue Stardream metallic envelopes (A2). Notecards are blank for your own message.

Printed using a Vandercook, you'll be able to see the textured impressions that only letterpress printing can provide. See close-up photos.

Sold as a set of 4 flat notecards, measuring 5.5" wide x 4.25" tall.

Looking for a different color or larger quantity? Please email us for additional details. Don't forget: We can also custom design for your needs!

name: Set of 8 Flower Thank You Notecards
description:
Say Thank You in a special way with this simple, yet sophisticated letterpress notecard.

A sunflower in a deep red with the words "thank you" are printed on Crane Lettra paper (100% cotton, paper-free) with matching red Stardream metallic envelopes (A2). Notecards are blank for your own message.

Printed using a Vandercook, you'll be able to see the textured impressions that only letterpress printing can provide. See close-up photos.

Sold as a set of 8 flat notecards, measuring 5.5" wide x 4.25" tall.

Looking for a different color or larger quantity? Please email us for additional details. Don't forget: We can also custom design for your needs!

name: Set of 6 Let's Have Drinks Invitations
description:
Perfect for an intimate gathering of good friends, wine and conversation. With a retro-modern look, this card is sure to show your guests how special they truly are!

A wine inspired 4-color design cards printed on Crane Lettra paper (100% cotton, paper-free) with eye-catching purple Stardream metallic envelopes (A2). Notecards are blank for your own message.

Printed using a Vandercook, you'll be able to see the textured impressions that only letterpress printing can provide. See close-up photos.

Sold as a set of 6 flat notecards, measuring 5.5" wide x 4.25" tall.

Looking for a different color or larger quantity? Please email us for additional details. Don't forget: We can also custom design for your needs!

description:
